## Context.Convert.validatedContextQualifierValueDecl variable

Converter which constructs a [validated context qualifier value declaration](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextqualifiervaluedecl.md) from a [context qualifier value declaration](./ts-res.context.icontextqualifiervaluedecl.md)<!-- -->, instantiating qualifiers by name from a supplied [conversion context](./ts-res.context.convert.icontextdeclconvertcontext.md)<!-- -->.
